title: How to Revoke STS Credentials for Leaked EC2 Instances
description: This section will delve into the critical steps to take when an EC2 instance is compromised and its STS credentials are at risk. How to Revoke STS Credentials for Leaked EC2 Instances.

seo.metatitle: How to Revoke STS Credentials for Leaked EC2 Instances
seo.metadescription: We'll cover methods to identify compromised instances, extract potential STS credentials, and most importantly, revoke those credentials to mitigate further damage.

title: Creating a Pre-rendered Home Page with Angular and Scully
description: Ready to start to transition your Angular site to the Jamstack? Why not start with your homepage where you can pre-render your content using Scully and store your assets on the cloud? This tutorial will get you up and deployed in no time!

seo.metadescription: Learn how to start transitioning Angular sites to the Jamstack. In this tutorial, we pre-render homepage content using Scully and store assets on the cloud. Get up and deployed in no time!
